meanings.definition: Relating to or characterized by hypertrophy.
meanings.sent1: The hypertrophic muscles of the bodybuilder were very large and strong.
meanings.sent2: The doctor observed the hypertrophic growth of the tumor during the examination.
meanings.sent3: The hypertrophic pumpkin in the garden was so big, it looked like it could win a prize!
meanings.sent4: Her love for him was like a hypertrophic tree, growing stronger and more resilient with each passing day.
meanings.sent5: The hypertrophic elephant in the room was impossible to ignore.

meanings.sent1: The hypertrophic heart of the athlete allowed him to endure long races.
meanings.sent2: The hypertrophic cells were multiplying rapidly in the lab experiment.
meanings.sent3: The hypertrophic balloon animal at the party was the biggest anyone had ever seen!
meanings.sent4: His hypertrophic ambition knew no bounds, propelling him to great success.
meanings.sent5: The hypertrophic waves crashed against the shore with immense power.
